summary: Successfully completed 2 commits. Committed 2 file change(s)

commits.message:
chore(kcmt): update last run log with provider switch

Switched from OpenAI to X.AI provider and updated model to grok-code-
fast-1. Recorded successful commits for test isolation and dependency
bump, with improved processing stats and auto-push enabled. Reduced file
count from 4 to 2, achieving full success.

feat(cli): add Ink runtime availability check

Add a new method to probe for a usable Node+Ink runtime by checking for
the node executable and resolving required packages (react, ink). This
prevents noisy stack traces when dependencies are missing and ensures
graceful fallback to the legacy CLI. The existing check method now uses
this probe in addition to path existence.

subjects: chore(kcmt): update last run log with provider switch
feat(cli): add Ink runtime availability check
